title: Ticket #2134: [Debian] Disable gt gahp for Debian
description: Debian maintainer does not yet know how to rebuild the necessary .jar files for gt gahp, therefore it needs to be (at least conditionally) disabled.
remarks:
2011-May-13 11:29:10 by tstclair:
There already exits a variable for downstream folks -DWANT_FULL_DEPLOYMENT:BOOL=FALSE (default is true). Which trims a lot of extra bits from the package which maintainers will likely not want to support.

2012-Jan-25 20:11:24 by jfrey:
The gt4 gahp has been removed from Condor entirely for 7.7.5. However, the unicore gahp remains, which has the same issue.
creator: cweiss
